short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly generate a quiz or summary based on the page you're viewing, using AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate quiz questions, flashcards, and now AI summaries from any web page!

With the Quizgecko Chrome extension, you can quickly turn the article or Youtube video you’re viewing into a summarized version, plus create questions and flashcards. Just click the extension icon while browsing, Quizgecko will give you the option to generate questions and flashcards, or summarize the page. 

Please Note: You’ll need a Quizgecko account to use this extension. It’s free to try up to 3 times per month. After that, you’ll need to upgrade to one of our paid plans.

How to Use
1. Create a free Quizgecko account
2. Install the extension.  
3. Click the Quizgecko icon on any page you’d like to summarize or generate quizzes/flashcards from. 

Transform your reading into interactive lessons in seconds!
